page.title: 11Farming
page.content: Mr.Hodgetts farm is called Model Farm. It is a dairy farm.Mr.Hodgetts farm is 200 acres,and he rents 40 acres.He has 90 cows,and 70 young ones.That is 20 calfs,24 between the age of 1 and 2,and 24 heffers.The cows are milked twice a day,at 6.00am,and 4.00pm.At 8.00am each morning the milk goes to Birmingham co- op firm.He's paid for his milk every month.The milk has to be inspected,it's tested for disease,and it must have en- ough fat,protien and lactose,(sugar). Mr. Hodgetts tank holds 600 gallons.If a bull is born,Mr.Hodgetts sells it to a cattle market.In the winter the cows are stabled and fed on silage and cow-cake.They use the manure for fertilizer.Mr.Hodgetts also has 18 acres of potatoes,and 100 acres of wheat.Its a very nice farm to go to.
